duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform internal audits and customer-requested counts as part of the cycle count process.
Review and count all material that a min card is pulled on and report to appropriate distribution at the plant.
Count and investigate material logged on the FIFO Over ride Forms and Log.
Attend regularly scheduled material meetings and perform data entry as required.
Maintain accurate department records and investigate discrepancies.
Be involved in Multi-disciplinary Five Phase Problem Solving Teams that drive the company’s Continuous Improvement Process and Policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Logistics, or related field (Certification in auditing is a plus)
